text: is a railway station operated by Shigaraki Kohgen Railway in Kōka, Shiga, Japan. The station's building dates from the Shigaraki Line's opening in 1933, making it the oldest structure on the line. == Ridership == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: 1em 0.2em; text-align: center;" ! colspan="2" |Ridership per day |- !Year !Ridership |- |2011 |370 |- |2012 |373 |- |2013 |339 |- |2014 |309 |- |2015 |332 |- |2016 |360 |- |2017 |294 |} == Adjacent stations == == References == Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1933 Category:Railway stations in Shiga Prefecture
title: Kumoi Station
